segments.text: Let me suggest this one . It's an excellent watch , it looks good , and it's only $ 100 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm . That's not too bad . Does it have a stopwatch ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Uh , no . Analog watches don't come with stopwatches . You'll have to get a digital if you want a stopwatch .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh . I see . Where are your digital watches ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't like this kind as much . Never mind the stopwatch then . I'll take that other one . Do you take checks ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Make it out to Time After Time .
segments.speaker: S1
